name: The Shooting Highway
description:
Your car is on the highway and enemies are preventing you from advancing by shooting at yourself, destroy there, but be careful, don't shoot civilians!

For moving :
   - Use Up, Down, Right, Left
   - Use Z Q S D
   - Use W A S D
Use Space for shooting.
Use Escape for going to the menu.
You need to destroy the ennemis cars (black and red) and avoid the civilians cars.
In order to destroy one ennemi car, you need to destroy his weapon.
Be careful if, you destroy a car, the wreck will stay on the road.
You can get back 1 heart.

You lose 1 heart :
   - if an ennemi hits you
   - if you ram an ennemi or a civilian
   - if you ram a wreck
You lose points :
   - if you shoot/ram/destroy a civilian
   - if you ram a civilian
   - if you ram a wreck 
You earn points :
   - if you destroy an ennemi weapon
   - if you shoot an ennemi
   - if you destroy an ennemi

You win when you reach the number of points to the level.

Level 1 : 250 PTS
Level 2 : 500 PTS
Level 3 : 1000 PTS

The time is counter, be quick !
